addPeople.countryReminder: Zovete izvan zemlje? Molim provjerite da li ste unijeli predbroj države!
addPeople.inviteMoreHeader: You are the only one in the meeting
addPeople.searchPeopleAndNumbers: Potražite osobe ili dodajte njihove telefonske brojeve
addPeople.shareLink: Share the meeting link to invite others

calendarSync.confirmAddLink: Želite li dodati Jitsi vezu u ovaj događaj?

error.generic: Došlo je do pogreške. Provjerite postavke kalendara ili pokušajte osvježiti kalendar.
error.notSignedIn: Došlo je do pogreške prilikom provjere autentičnosti za prikaz događaja u kalendaru. Provjerite postavke kalendara i pokušajte se ponovno prijaviti.

calendarSync.permissionMessage: Dozvola za kalendar je obavezna kako biste vidjeli sastanke u aplikaciji.

chat.noMessagesMessage: There are no messages in the meeting yet. Start a conversation here!

chromeExtensionBanner.installExtensionText: Install the extension for Google Calendar and Office 365 integration

connection.LOW_BANDWIDTH: Video for {{displayName}} has been turned off to save bandwidth
connection.RECONNECTING: Dogodio se problem s mrežom. Ponovno povezivanje...

deepLinking.appNotInstalled: Da biste se pridružili ovom sastanku na telefonu, potrebna vam je mobilna aplikacija {{app}}.
deepLinking.description: Ništa se nije dogodilo? Pokušali smo pokrenuti vaš sastanak u aplikaciji {{app}} na radnoj površini. Pokušajte ponovno ili ga pokrenite u web-aplikaciji {{app}}.
deepLinking.ifDoNotHaveApp: If you don't have the app yet:
deepLinking.ifHaveApp: If you already have the app:
deepLinking.joinInApp: Join this meeting using the app
deepLinking.title: Pokretanje sastanka u {{app}}…

deviceError.cameraPermission: Greška kod dohvata dozvole za kameru
deviceError.microphonePermission: Greška kod dohvata dozvole za mikrofon

dialog.alreadySharedVideoTitle: Istodobno je dopušten samo jedan zajednički videozapis
dialog.cameraConstraintFailedError: Vaša kamera ne zadovoljava neka od potrebnih ograničenja.
dialog.cameraNotSendingData: Ne možemo pristupiti vašoj kameri. Provjerite koristi li ovaj uređaj neki drugi program, odaberite drugi uređaj s izbornika postavki ili pokušajte ponovno učitati program.
dialog.cameraPermissionDeniedError: Niste odobrili korištenje kamere. I dalje se možete pridružiti konferenciji, ali drugi vas neće vidjeti. Pomoću gumba kamere u adresnoj traci to popravite.
dialog.cameraUnknownError: Nije moguće koristiti kameru iz nepoznatog razloga.
dialog.cameraUnsupportedResolutionError: Fotoaparat ne podržava potrebnu razlučivost videozapisa.
dialog.conferenceDisconnectMsg: Provjerite vašu mrežnu vezu. Ponovno spajanje za {{seconds}} sekundi…
dialog.conferenceReloadMsg: Pokušavamo popraviti. Ponovno spajanje za {{seconds}} sekundi…
dialog.conferenceReloadTitle: Nažalost, nešto je pošlo po zlu.
dialog.connectError: Uh! Nešto je pošlo po zlu i nismo se mogli povezati s konferencijom.
dialog.connectErrorWithMsg: Uh! Nešto je pošlo po zlu i nismo se mogli povezati s konferencijom: {{msg}}
dialog.e2eeDescription: End-to-End Encryption is currently EXPERIMENTAL. Please keep in mind that turning on end-to-end encryption will effectively disable server-side provided services such as: recording, live streaming and phone participation. Also keep in mind that the meeting will only work for people joining from browsers with support for insertable streams.
dialog.e2eeWarning: WARNING: Not all participants in this meeting seem to have support for End-to-End encryption. If you enable it they won't be able to see nor hear you.
dialog.grantModeratorDialog: Are you sure you want to make this participant a moderator?
dialog.internalError: Ups! Nešto je pošlo po zlu. Dogodila se greška: {{error}}
dialog.kickParticipantDialog: Jeste li sigurni da želite izbaciti ovog sudionika?
dialog.liveStreamingDisabledBecauseOfActiveReco: Not possible while recording is active
dialog.logoutQuestion: Jeste li sigurni da se želite odjaviti i zaustaviti konferenciju?
dialog.micConstraintFailedError: Vaš mikrofon ne zadovoljava neka od potrebnih ograničenja.
dialog.micPermissionDeniedError: Niste odobrili korištenje mikrofona. I dalje se možete pridružiti konferenciji, ali vas drugi neće čuti. Pomoću gumba kamere u adresnoj traci to popravite.
dialog.micUnknownError: Nije moguće koristiti mikrofon iz nepoznatog razloga.
dialog.muteEveryoneElseDialog: Once muted, you won't be able to unmute them, but they can unmute themselves at any time.
dialog.muteEveryoneDialog: Are you sure you want to mute everyone? You won't be able to unmute them, but they can unmute themselves at any time.
dialog.muteEveryoneStartMuted: Everyone starts muted from now on
dialog.muteParticipantBody: Ne možete ih ponovno uključiti, ali oni se mogu sami uključiti u bilo kojem trenutku.
dialog.muteParticipantDialog: Jeste li sigurni da želite isključiti ovog sudionika? Ne možete ih uključiti, ali oni mogu biti uključeni u bilo kojem trenutku.
dialog.passwordNotSupported: Postavljanje lozinke za susret nije podržano.
dialog.popupError: Vaš preglednik blokira skočne prozore s ove web-lokacije. Omogućite skočne prozore u sigurnosnim postavkama preglednika i pokušajte ponovno.
dialog.recordingDisabledBecauseOfActiveLiveStre: Not possible while a live stream is active
dialog.remoteControlAllowedMessage: {{user}} je prihvatio vaš zahtjev daljinskog upravljanja!
dialog.remoteControlDeniedMessage: {{user}} je odbio vaš zahtjev daljinskog upravljanja!
dialog.remoteControlErrorMessage: Došlo je do pogreške prilikom pokušaja zahtjeva za dozvole daljinskog upravljanja od {{user}}!
dialog.remoteControlRequestMessage: Hoćete li dopustiti {{user}} daljinski upravljati radnom površinom?
dialog.remoteControlShareScreenWarning: Imajte na umu da ako pritisnete "Dopusti" podijelit ćete zaslon!
dialog.removeSharedVideoMsg: Jeste li sigurni da želite ukloniti dijeljeni videozapis?
dialog.screenSharingFailed: Oops! Something went wrong, we weren’t able to start screen sharing!
dialog.screenSharingPermissionDeniedError: Uh! Nešto se dogodilo s vašim dijeljenjem dozvola za proširenje na zaslonu. Ponovno učitajte i pokušajte ponovno.
dialog.sendPrivateMessage: You recently received a private message. Did you intend to reply to that privately, or you want to send your message to the group?
dialog.startRemoteControlErrorMessage: Došlo je do pogreške prilikom pokušaja pokretanja sesije daljinskog upravljača!
dialog.stopRecordingWarning: Da li ste sigurni da želite zaustaviti snimanje?
dialog.stopStreamingWarning: Da li ste sigurani da želite zaustaviti emitiranje uživo?
dialog.tokenAuthFailed: Žao nam je, nije vam dozvoljeno pridružiti se pozivu.
dialog.externalInstallationMsg: Trebate instalirati proširenje za dijeljenje radne površine.
dialog.inlineInstallationMsg: Trebate instalirati proširenje za dijeljenje radne površine.
dialog.liveStreamingDisabledForGuestTooltip: Gosti ne mogu pokrenuti emitiranje uživo.
dialog.screenSharingFailedToInstall: Uh! Nije uspjelo instaliranje proširenja dijeljenja zaslona.
dialog.screenSharingFailedToInstallTitle: Nije uspjelo instaliranje proširenja dijeljenja zaslona
dialog.screenSharingFirefoxPermissionDeniedErro: Nešto je pošlo po krivu dok smo pokušavali dijeliti vaš zaslon. Provjerite jeste li nam dali dopuštenje.
dialog.screenSharingFirefoxPermissionDeniedTitl: Uh! Nismo mogli pokrenuti dijeljenje zaslona!

e2ee.labelToolTip: Audio and Video Communication on this call is end-to-end encrypted

info.dialANumber: Da biste se pridružili sastanku, nazovite jedan od tih brojeva i unesite pin.
info.dialInNotSupported: Nažalost, pozivanje u trenutno nije podržano.
info.genericError: Ups, nešto je pošlo po zlu.
info.inviteLiveStream: Da biste pogledali prijenos uživo ovog sastanka, kliknite ovu vezu: {{url}}
info.tooltip: Podijelite vezu i informacije za nazivanje ovog sastanka
info.label: Informacije o sastanku

liveStreaming.limitNotificationDescriptionWeb: Due to high demand your streaming will be limited to {{limit}} min. For unlimited streaming try {{app}}.
liveStreaming.limitNotificationDescriptionNative: Your streaming will be limited to {{limit}} min. For unlimited streaming try {{app}}.
liveStreaming.busy: Radimo na oslobađanju streaming resursa. Molim pokušajte ponovno za par minuta.
liveStreaming.chooseCTA: Odaberite opciju emitiranja. Trenutno ste prijavljeni kao {{email}}.
liveStreaming.enterStreamKey: Ovdje unesite ključ YouTube prijenos uživo.
liveStreaming.error: Emitiranje uživo nije uspjelo. Pokušajte ponovno.
liveStreaming.errorLiveStreamNotEnabled: Emitiranje uživo nije omogućeno na {{email}}. Omogućite prijenos uživo ili se prijavite na račun s omogućenim prijenosom uživo.
liveStreaming.expandedOn: Ovaj sastanak se emitira uživo na YouTube.
liveStreaming.getStreamKeyManually: Nismo mogli dohvatiti niti jedan prijenos uživo. Pokušajte dobiti ključ uživo iz usluge YouTube.
liveStreaming.invalidStreamKey: Ključ za emitiranje uživo možda je pogrešan.
liveStreaming.signInCTA: Prijavite se ili unisete vaš YouTube ključ za emitiranje uživo.

notify.suboptimalBrowserWarning: We are afraid your meeting experience isn't going to be that great here. We are looking for ways to improve this, but until then please try using one of the fully supported browsers.
notify.oldElectronClientDescription1: You appear to be using an old version of the Jitsi Meet client which has known security vulnerabilities. Please make sure you update to our

prejoin.audioDeviceProblem: There is a problem with your audio device

connection.nonOptimal: Your internet connection is not optimal
connection.poor: You have a poor internet connection

connectionDetails.audioClipping: We expect your audio to be clipped.
connectionDetails.audioHighQuality: We expect your audio to have excellent quality.
connectionDetails.audioLowNoVideo: We expect your audio quality to be low and no video.
connectionDetails.goodQuality: Awesome! Your media quality is going to be great.
connectionDetails.noMediaConnectivity: We could not find a way to establish media connectivity for this test. This is typically caused by a firewall or NAT.
connectionDetails.noVideo: We expect that your video will be terrible.
connectionDetails.undetectable: If you still can not make calls in browser, we recommend that you make sure your speakers, microphone and camera are properly set up, that you have granted your browser rights to use your microphone and camera, and that your browser version is up-to-date. If you still have trouble calling, you should contact the web application developer.
connectionDetails.veryPoorConnection: We expect your call quality to be really terrible.
connectionDetails.videoFreezing: We expect your video to freeze, turn black, and be pixelated.
connectionDetails.videoHighQuality: We expect your video to have good quality.
connectionDetails.videoLowQuality: We expect your video to have low quality in terms of frame rate and resolution.
connectionDetails.videoTearing: We expect your video to be pixelated or have visual artefacts.

prejoin.dialInPin: Dial into the meeting and enter PIN code:
prejoin.errorDialOutFailed: Could not dial out. Call failed
prejoin.errorMissingName: Please enter your name to join the meeting
prejoin.lookGood: It sounds like your microphone is working properly

recording.limitNotificationDescriptionWeb: Due to high demand your recording will be limited to {{limit}} min. For unlimited recordings try {{app}}.
recording.limitNotificationDescriptionNative: Due to high demand your recording will be limited to {{limit}} min. For unlimited recordings try <3>{{app}}</3>.
recording.error: Emitiranje uživo nije uspjelo. Pokušajte ponovno.

security.about: You can add a $t(lockRoomPassword) to your meeting. Participants will need to provide the $t(lockRoomPassword) before they are allowed to join the meeting.
security.aboutReadOnly: Moderator participants can add a $t(lockRoomPassword) to the meeting. Participants will need to provide the $t(lockRoomPassword) before they are allowed to join the meeting.
security.insecureRoomNameWarning: The room name is unsafe. Unwanted participants may join your conference. Consider securing your meeting using the security button.

calendar.about: Integracija kalendara {{appName}} koristi se za siguran pristup kalendaru tako da može čitati nadolazeće događaje.
calendar.signedIn: Trenutno pristupate događajima kalendara za {{email}}. Kliknite gumb Odspoji u nastavku da biste zaustavili pristup događajima u kalendaru.
calendar.title: Kalendar

settingsView.disableCrashReportingWarning: Are you sure you want to disable crash reporting? The setting will be applied after you restart the app.

startupoverlay.genericTitle: The meeting needs to use your microphone and camera.
startupoverlay.title: {{app}} treba koristiti vaš mikrofon i kameru.

toolbar.noAudioSignalTitle: There is no input coming from your mic!
toolbar.noAudioSignalDesc: If you did not purposely mute it from system settings or hardware, consider switching the device.
toolbar.noAudioSignalDescSuggestion: If you did not purposely mute it from system settings or hardware, consider switching to the suggested device.
toolbar.noisyAudioInputTitle: Your microphone appears to be noisy!
toolbar.noisyAudioInputDesc: It sounds like your microphone is making noise, please consider muting or changing the device.

transcribing.error: Emitiranje uživo nije uspjelo. Pokušajte ponovno.

userMedia.electronGrantPermissions: Molim dozvolite upotrebu kamere i mikrofona
userMedia.firefoxGrantPermissions: Odaberite Dijeljenje odabranog uređaja kada preglednik zatraži dopuštenja.
userMedia.nwjsGrantPermissions: Molim dozvolite upotrebu kamere i mikrofona

welcomepage.appDescription: Samo naprijed, koristite videopozive sa cijelim timom. Zapravo, pozovite sve koje znate. {{app}} je potpuno šifrirano, videokonferencijsko rješenje 100% otvorenog koda koje možete koristiti cijeli dan, svaki dan, besplatno - bez potrebe za računom.
welcomepage.connectCalendarText: Povežite svoj kalendar da biste vidjeli sve svoje sastanke u {{app}}. Osim toga, dodajte {{provider}} sastanke u svoj kalendar i pokrenite ih jednim klikom.
welcomepage.jitsiOnMobile: Jitsi on mobile – download our apps and start a meeting from anywhere
welcomepage.moderatedMessage: Or book a meeting URL in advance where you are the only moderator.
welcomepage.recentListEmpty: Vaš popis nedavnih razgovora je prazan. Čavrljajte sa svojim timom i ovdje ćete pronaći popis nedavnih sastanaka.
welcomepage.roomNameAllowedChars: Meeting name should not contain any of these characters: ?, &, :, ', ", %, #.
welcomepage.roomnameHint: Unesite naziv ili URL sobe koju želite pridružiti. Možete izmijeniti ime, samo neka ljudi s kojima se sastajete to znaju kako bi unijeli isto ime.
welcomepage.title: Sigurna, potpuno opremljena i potpuno besplatna videokonferencija

lonelyMeetingExperience.youAreAlone: You are the only one in the meeting

lobby.backToKnockModeButton: No password, ask to join instead
lobby.disableDialogContent: Lobby mode is currently enabled. This feature ensures that unwanted participants can't join your meeting. Do you want to disable it?
lobby.enableDialogText: Lobby mode lets you protect your meeting by only allowing people to enter after a formal approval by a moderator.
lobby.joiningMessage: You'll join the meeting as soon as someone accepts your request
lobby.joinWithPasswordMessage: Trying to join with password, please wait...
lobby.joinRejectedMessage: Your join request was rejected by a moderator.
lobby.knockTitle: Someone wants to join the meeting
lobby.notificationLobbyAccessDenied: {{targetParticipantName}} has been rejected to join by {{originParticipantName}}
lobby.notificationLobbyAccessGranted: {{targetParticipantName}} has been allowed to join by {{originParticipantName}}

share.dialInfoText:
=====

Just want to dial in on your phone?

{{defaultDialInNumber}}Click this link to see the dial in phone numbers for this meeting
{{dialInfoPageUrl}}
share.mainText:
1. Please join my online meeting.

{{roomUrl}}

Google Chrome is recommended for the best experience.

2. Use your microphone and speakers (VoIP) - a headset is recommended.

chat.noMessagesMessage:
There are no messages in the meeting yet.
Start a conversation typing to input down.
